experience.description: Monitorables is an online market research store aiming specifically at e-commerce industry. I involved handling the business side of the things as well as maintaining the website.

Social Swag is a digital marketing company that focuses on creating content for the web. My duty was to maintain the custom-built content management software. Adding new features, fixing bugs, maintenance of a large codebase using Vue and Sass, and collaborating with team members using Git, Asana, Slack
Building websites, landing pages, html emails, designing banners and social media posts.
Maintaining company's website, email marketing, SEO, graphic design, social media posts, Google analytics.
